channel.title: Posts on Benjamin Wen
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Benjamin Wen

item.title: Action Is the ONLY Thing That Matters
item.description: When I am truly executing, building, growing, I get a sense for what the next step is. When I am just maintaining, the next step is out of reach. There is no next step without me taking action. – Jordan O’Connor (Photo by Kamil Pietrzak)

item.title: Swift Expressible Literal
item.description: This is the English version of my post at cnblogs.com. A Question Given the code bellow: 1 2 3 4 5 struct Book { let name: String } let book: Book = "Charlotte's Web" Is there a way to make it work? So, is there a way to implicitly create a struct from a string literal? Expressible Literal Protocol The answer is yes, with the the magic of expressible literal protocol.

item.title: A Look Back At 2020
item.description: üôÄ Anxiety 2020 was tough for many, and for me as well. (Photo by Colton Sturgeon) A couple of days ago, in December 31 at night, I finished the brief review of my 2020 and sent it to Ts, a friend I met on a hike back in 2017. Ts would then make it part of the yearly collection of reviews. There would be about 40 of them, all collected

item.title: My First IELTS (Academic) Test
item.description: (Photo by Jenny Pace) I had my first IELTS test last month. Here is the result: Listening Reading Writing Speaking 7.5 8 6 5 So, writing and speaking are my weak points. This time I hadn’t spended much time preparing for writing and speaking tests. Actually, 6 is beyond my expectation. My expectation for writing was 4~5 before I handed in the answer sheets.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: First of all, a resolution! This is my fifth time rebuilding this blog ü§¶üèª. Hopefully, I will manage to write regularly in the coming years.
